name: Ballista
description: A simple design much improved by a master smith's loving hand.
tips: Ballista is best shared with ranged carry heroes who rely on physical damage: Sharing a Ballista to an allied Sniper helps boost his already high damage and attack range. The passive deals bonus damage and knockback to prevent the enemies from coming near him. Sharing it to an allied Windranger allows her to continuously knockback the enemies during Focus Fire. Sharing it with a Level 25 Medusa with the Split shoot talent will apply it to every hero Medusa is attacking.
